markdownRemark.html:
Hi! I’m a former pro table tennis athlete currently studying computer science at Georgia Tech. My interests in the field lie primarily in mobile application development (Android), full stack web development, and machine learning.

I have done software engineering internships in the past with PlayStation and Siemens, and will be joining LinkedIn this fall semester.

Some things I enjoy outside of making software:

  • Table tennis 🏓 + basketball 🏀 + ice skating ⛸️ <= I try not to fall more than once every 3 seconds
  • Stock investing 📈 (quantitative + discretionary)
  • Movies + dramas 🎥
  • Beat making 🎶
  • “Entrepreneurship” 💡
